banner_title: Your donations make a difference. Participate in our challenge today!
banner_desc: Create your fundraising page, set your goal, and inspire others to donate!
card_desc: Join our Ramadan challenge to provide iftar meals for families in need. Every $50 feeds a family for a day.
contributing_desc: Help families in need experience a blessed Ramadan.
heros_desc: Thank you for your extraordinary generosity and commitment to making a difference.
stories_desc: Our heroes join hands to fund meals, build shelters, and support education, driven by the shared goal of spreading kindness. This year, we invite you to be part of this journey, turning small gestures into impactful change. By supporting a Ramadan challenge, you’re not only helping achieve a community goal but also creating lasting memories of giving during this blessed month  See more.
ready: Ready to Make a Difference This Ramadan.
ready_desc: Your contributions create change. Let’s reach our goals together.
